name: Cum Clicker
description:
Do you ever fantasize about having a lot of cum? Yes? Well this is your chance!
Click, buy and upgrade. Be patient and you will have all the cum you can ever ask for!

Cum Clicker is an idle clicker game where you need to get as much cum as possible. To help you with this, you can recruit bananas, ghosts, clowns and much more!
